Intervention.evidence: We tested the effect of fibrinogen concentrates Haemocomplettan® (CSL Behring, Marburg, Germany) and fibryga® (Octapharma GmbH, Langenfeld, Germany)

Objective.evidence: We tested the effect of fibrinogen concentrates Haemocomplettan® (CSL Behring, Marburg, Germany) and fibryga® (Octapharma GmbH, Langenfeld, Germany) on the impairments induced by 60% dilutional coagulopathy in vitro.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Dilution with either diluent resulted in prolonged clotting time (CT) in an extrinsic activated test (CTEXTEM) and decreased maximum clot firmness (MCFFIBTEM) as expressed, e.g., by gelatine: (59.5 s [62/54.8] vs. 95 s [102.8/86.8]; p < 0.001 and 14 mm [16/10.5] vs. 3 mm [4–3]; p < 0.001).
